document_data.mainbody:
Alkrist was a monk of the Avowed as well as one of the eight Great Readers of Candlekeep during the late 15 century DR.
He was considered to be Candlekeeps most knowledgeable individual on the topic of militarism and politics. He had expertise knowledge on many of the battles in Torils history.
As one of the Great Readers, Alkrist was partially responsible for the day-to-day duties that were required to maintain Candlekeeps daily duties.
